TopicTitle: Naten's Rudders: TESTING PHASE. Customizable Rudder System!

Articles.Content:
I present to you...

a fun little custom rudder system.

NOTE: THIS MOD IS IN ITS TESTING PHASE. OPEN BETA WILL COME IN ABOUT A DAY. PLEASE LEAVE THIS THREAD IN THE RELEASES/PROJECTS SHOWCASE, I HAVE IT READY, I JUST NEED TO ORGANIZE DOWNLOADS.

Thanks.

Overview of features included in this mod...

  • A growing number of textures to choose from! Choose from a variety of textures!
  • "Noob-Friendly" part configs! I've written comments and organized the part configs so it's easy for non-part config modders! (I'm not implying anyone who doesn't mod part .cfg's is a noob! )
  • Movable rudders and passive rudders! The part config should have a "moduleControlSurf" (or whatever it's called ) if it moves, and if it doesn't if it's stationary. Using this, you can choose how your rudder works!

Tips on rudders...

Place them far back on your plane for more leverage on the thing!

Make sure your rudder doesn't move so much it stalls. That can make your plane spin around... and around... until it's pointing towards the retrograde vector, aerodynamics get tricky, and you're falling straight down...

(but it's awesome at airshows! )

doge rudder

much doge

tower to dogeplane won

come in on vektir zooloo niner

This mod is PARTIALLY OPEN ASSET!

Mod dev kits/tools:

Blank UV Map PNG for texture art people

More will be included soon.

If you made a texture, upload it here and I'll include it in the pack if you want!

I need lots of help.

THIS MOD IS LICENSED UNDER THE FOLLOWING:

all rights reserved

Thanks.

Now, I can do moar modding on mah computah

GPU: ASUS Radeon HD 7790 (@~2.2 GHz)

CPU: AMD Athlon X4 Quad-Core (@3.4 GHz)

Pilot: Jebediah Kerman (@12345 GHz)

RAM: 4GB 240-pin DDR3 Crucial Ballistix, 2 of these

So, now I can record mod demonstration videos and stuff!

but the drivers are in need of updating, i need to type so slowly...

Here's how bad it is without fixing:

So, guise, it may be a bit longer. I'll still release VERY soon, though.
